item.title: "Wouldn't it be neat if you could write C++ inline in Rust?"
item.description: In June of 2015, I had an idea. At the time, I was obsessed with compilers, and what was possible to do at compile time. For one of the languages which I was working on, I got excited by the idea that I could have flawless C++ interop by embedding â€¦
item.dc:creator: Nika Layzell
